title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in TH, selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu does not produce any result. The expected behavior is for the action to add Javadoc to the field.
SR: Either the 'Add Javadoc' option should be removed from the context menu or, preferably, selecting 'Add Javadoc' should add the appropriate Javadoc to the field.
